1813.desc: Timeout #1 by NO at 00:45. The timeout is a result of the injury to #75 T.Walker.  Atlanta had called time-out, but owing to the injury to a New Orleans player, New Orleans was charged with a time-out instead of Atlanta.

1834.desc: (:45) (Shotgun) M.Ryan pass incomplete deep left. PENALTY on ATL-M.Ryan, Intentional Grounding, 9 yards, enforced at ATL 43. New Orleans chose to decline the option of a 10-second runoff on the clock, which came with the intentional grounding call.  The penalty is 10 yards and loss of down.  However, officials only walked off a 9-yard penalty.
